title: AR Guides Overview
body: This course provides you with an overview of Anticipation-Reaction Guides (AR Guides), a tool designed to support studentsâ€™ reading comprehension through a set of anticipatory statements used Before, During, and After reading.

title: Instructional Steps for AR Guides
body: This course demonstrates the Instructional Steps for teaching students to use Anticipation-Reaction Guides Before, During, and After reading.

title: Remote Learning with AR Guides
body: This course provides technological supports for using AR Guides during remote instruction. Synchonous and asynchronous options are included.
